name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and programming languages.
schedule: Mon, Wed, Fri - 10:00 AM to 11:30 AM

name: Algorithms and Data Structures
description: A deep dive into algorithms, data structures, and their applications in real-world problem-solving.

name: Electrical Engineering Basics
description: An introductory course to electrical engineering, focusing on circuits, electromagnetism, and basic electrical theory.

name: Data Science with Python
description: Learn how to manipulate data, perform statistical analysis, and create data-driven solutions using Python. Best Course Ever!

name: Machine Learning
description: Understand the principles of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.

name: Digital Circuit Design
description: Learn the fundamentals of digital circuits, logic gates, and how to design digital systems.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: Study mathematical structures and concepts such as sets, relations, graphs, and combinatorics.
schedule: Mon, Wed, Fri - 8:00 AM to 9:30 AM

name: Database Systems
description: Learn the fundamentals of database design, normalization, and SQL programming for managing data.

name: Web Development
description: Introduction to web development, focusing on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: An introduction to the principles of cybersecurity, network security, and data protection.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Learn about cloud services, deployment models, and the architecture of cloud-based systems.

name: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Explore advanced machine learning topics such as deep learning, reinforcement learning, and natural language processing.

name: Intro to Artificial Intelligence
description: An introductory course to AI concepts, including search algorithms, machine learning, and robotics.

name: Embedded Systems
description: Learn the basics of embedded systems, including microcontrollers, sensors, and real-time operating systems.

name: Computational Biology
description: Explore the intersection of computer science and biology, focusing on algorithms for genomic data analysis.

name: Internet of Things (IoT)
description: Learn the principles and technologies behind the Internet of Things, including sensors, networks, and cloud integration.

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Understand the key principles of software engineering, including design patterns, testing, and project management.

name: Quantum Computing
description: Introduction to quantum computing, including quantum bits, quantum gates, and algorithms.

name: Mobile Application Development
description: Learn how to develop mobile applications using modern frameworks like Flutter and React Native.

name: Operating Systems
description: Study the core concepts of operating systems, including memory management, file systems, and process synchronization.

name: Computer Networks
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer networking, including protocols, network architectures, and security.

name: Data Visualization
description: Learn how to visualize data using tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn.

name: Artificial Neural Networks
description: An in-depth look into artificial neural networks, including deep learning and convolutional networks.
